message.raw:
Initial pass at enabling word wrap for value field of global variables.

Existing issues:
 * Editor does not word wrap, so this is only cosmetic for now
 * The cell height calculation is not aware of elide rules. If elide conceals
 multiple rows, the cell height will be too large on display.
